languages.text: {n}Голос Караэля лишен какого-либо выражения.{/n} "Эзирраеш потеряли право зваться первыми среди нас. Если такова воля Черного сердца — мы уничтожим тех, кто опозорил кабал".

{n}Kharael's voice is devoid of any emotion.{/n} "The Aezyrraesh have lost the right to be considered the first among us. If the Black Heart wills it, we will destroy those who have dishonoured the Kabal."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Караэля лишен какого-либо выражения.{/n} "Эзирраеш потеряли право зваться первыми среди нас. Если такова воля Черного сердца — мы уничтожим тех, кто опозорил кабал".

traits.speaker: Karael

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael's voice is devoid of any emotion.{/n} "The Aezyrraesh have lost the right to be considered the first among us. If the Black Heart wills it, we will destroy those who have dishonoured the Kabal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael's voice is devoid of any emotion.{/n} "The Aezyrraesh have lost the right to be considered the first among us. If the Black Heart wills it, we will destroy those who have dishonoured the Kabal."
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}Kharaels Stimme ist frei von jeder Emotion.{/n} "Die Aezyrraesh haben das Recht verwirkt, als Erste unter uns zu gelten. Wenn das Schwarze Herz es will, vernichten wir jene, die die Kabale entehrt haben."
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael's voice is devoid of any emotion.{/n} "The Aezyrraesh have lost the right to be considered the first among us. If the Black Heart wills it, we will destroy those who have dishonoured the Kabal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharaels Stimme ist frei von jeder Emotion.{/n} "Die Aezyrraesh haben das Recht verwirkt, als Erste unter uns zu gelten. Wenn das Schwarze Herz es will, vernichten wir jene, die die Kabale entehrt haben."
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}卡瑞尔的声音没有流露出任何情感。{/n}“艾泽拉什家族无权担任我们的领袖。在黑心阴谋团的意愿之下，我们将消灭所有玷污阴谋团的人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael's voice is devoid of any emotion.{/n} "The Aezyrraesh have lost the right to be considered the first among us. If the Black Heart wills it, we will destroy those who have dishonoured the Kabal."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡瑞尔的声音没有流露出任何情感。{/n}“艾泽拉什家族无权担任我们的领袖。在黑心阴谋团的意愿之下，我们将消灭所有玷污阴谋团的人。”
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}Kharael énonce froidement :{/n} « Les Aezyrraesh ont perdu le droit d'être considérés comme nos supérieurs. Si le Cœur Noir le désire, nous détruirons ceux qui ont déshonoré la Kabale. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael's voice is devoid of any emotion.{/n} "The Aezyrraesh have lost the right to be considered the first among us. If the Black Heart wills it, we will destroy those who have dishonoured the Kabal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael énonce froidement :{/n} « Les Aezyrraesh ont perdu le droit d'être considérés comme nos supérieurs. Si le Cœur Noir le désire, nous détruirons ceux qui ont déshonoré la Kabale. »
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}La voz de Kharael carece completamente de emociones.{/n} «Los Aezyrraesh han perdido el derecho a considerarse los primeros de entre nosotros. Si es la voluntad del Corazón Negro, aniquilaremos a aquellos que han deshonrado a la Kábala».
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael's voice is devoid of any emotion.{/n} "The Aezyrraesh have lost the right to be considered the first among us. If the Black Heart wills it, we will destroy those who have dishonoured the Kabal."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Kharael carece completamente de emociones.{/n} «Los Aezyrraesh han perdido el derecho a considerarse los primeros de entre nosotros. Si es la voluntad del Corazón Negro, aniquilaremos a aquellos que han deshonrado a la Kábala».
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}カラエルの声にはなんの感情も込められていない。{/n}「アエジレシュは我々の中で最も優先されるべき正義を失った。黒き心臓がそれを実現しようとするならば、陰謀団の名誉を汚した者は始末する」
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael's voice is devoid of any emotion.{/n} "The Aezyrraesh have lost the right to be considered the first among us. If the Black Heart wills it, we will destroy those who have dishonoured the Kabal."

traits.locale_text: {n}カラエルの声にはなんの感情も込められていない。{/n}「アエジレシュは我々の中で最も優先されるべき正義を失った。黒き心臓がそれを実現しようとするならば、陰謀団の名誉を汚した者は始末する」
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}Kharael'in sesinde hiçbir duygu emaresi bulunmuyor.{/n} "Aezyrraesh, ilkimiz olma hakkını kaybetti. Kara Yürek dilesin, Kabal'ın onuruna leke sürmüş olanları yok ederiz."
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael's voice is devoid of any emotion.{/n} "The Aezyrraesh have lost the right to be considered the first among us. If the Black Heart wills it, we will destroy those who have dishonoured the Kabal."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael'in sesinde herhangi bir duygu yok:{/n} "Aezyrraesh, ilkimiz olarak değerlendirilme hakkını kaybetti. Kara Yürek dilerse, Kabal'ın onuruna leke sürmüş olanları yok ederiz."
traits.speaker: Karael
